title: LF Team/OOL Team Support main
body:
Im a keen and dedicated player 24-7 availability ive been playing in teams for 3 years have shot calling experience and have been in orgs such as furox and sub zero.
Im easy to work with and always keen to learn and adapt to anyone's play style and meta
champ pool is nearly every single support i can learn them all if needed
my rank may not be flashy right now its D5 in flex P4 in solo but i can safely say i can compete with nearly anyone in any team with OOL and have proof through scrims and players

Add me on league or leave a comment on this page if u want to talk further with me
IGN: Beefybill

replies.body: Hi there, so you are support main? My group here just need a support. I am the leader of my team. Oceania serve is what I currently started. I was gold in s6 in my old account. My group is kind and nice. Although our jg is kind of new. But I think it will be fine, I still train him. Welcome to add me JLYFireGod. We are pleased to have you.
